about_the_game:
Slay thousands of monsters and survive the night raids, where new bosses and monsters appear. Magic Storm is a casual game with roguelite elements where your choices make all the difference, create custom builds and survive the final eclipse.

About the game

You have been summoned by a wizard to another world dominated by monsters and your task is to free this world from the rule of these creatures. But be careful, every night new bosses and beings emerge, increasingly stronger until the arrival of the Final Eclipse, a famous prophecy of the end of times, which brings an eternal night and also the return of the supreme monster.

Gameplay

Similar to Vampire Survivor, Magic Storm is also a Bullet Hell with Roguelite elements, where at each level you choose which skill to improve, the main difference is that you are the one who uses the skills, but we also have the Arcade mode, where damage skills are triggered automatically, a good way to start and adapt to the game.

Game Modes

- Arcade: all damaging skills are used automatically by the game, you need to worry about using buff skills, such as life recovery, increased movement speed and etc.
- Hardcore: you decide the best time and where to use ALL your skills. Try this mode, I made this game with this gameplay in mind :D

Skills

There are 5 main categories of skills:
- Fire;
- Water;
- Air;
- Earth;
- General;

Initially you start by being able to select only the General skills, but when defeating the elemental bosses you acquire magical knowledge of that element, for example, when eliminating the Fire Elemental Boss you will be able to use fire skills when you level up, even in other matches, is a permanent achievement. You can even start another game with some initial fire skills.


In the DEMO version we only have one build, which is fire and some buff skills.

Important message

Help me build this game, any feedback is welcome!
This is my first commercial game and I'm making it with great care for you, I'm trying to translate it into some languages ​​to make it as accessible as possible, if there are any errors let me know, I'll be happy to improve the experience in your language.
If possible, follow me on social media and join our discord so we can make a beautiful game together.

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
